title: Was ‘Hyram F. Suddfluffel’s’ Impeachment Message Real and Accurate?
subtitle: Supporters of U. S. President Donald Trump gleefully shared a social media post that suggested impeaching the president could backfire spectacularly.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A viral social media post about the outcome of impeaching U. S. President Donald Trump was accurate and was written by "Hyram F. Suddfluffel."
